articles.title: Keir Starmer and Volodymyr Zelensky to meet at Downing Street - BBC.com
articles.description: Zelensky has arrived in the UK a day before Sir Keir is set to host a summit of European leaders to discuss an end to the war between Ukraine and Russia
articles.content:
Tom McArthur & Emma Rossiter
Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky will meet in Downing Street on Saturday afternoon, No 10 has said.
Zelensky arrived at St… [+3754 chars]

articles.author: Willem Marx
articles.title: European leaders renew support for Ukraine after Zelenskyy's stormy meeting with Trump - NPR
articles.description: Leaders from across Europe came quickly to the defense of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, after his televised clash with President Trump and Vice President Vance.
articles.content:
PARIS Leaders from across Europe came quickly to the defense of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, after his televised clash with President Trump and Vice President Vance.
